projects publications
My work has two main strands.

Digital Reading and Writing

Designing and evaluating interfaces and interactions to support individual and collective sensemaking of texts

MOOCs

Analyzing and improving a new type of learning environment which brings together the structure of traditional universities courses with the scale and accessibility of the open Web.
